mapper.select: select t.documentcode,b.documentname,count(1) as c from L_APPLICATIONBILL_T t,B_DOCUMENTTYPE_T b where t.documentcode = b.documentcode and t.approverfirst = #{carno,jdbcType = VARCHAR} and t.firsttime is null and t.validflag > 0 and trunc(to_date(t.inoutdate, 'yyyy:MM:dd hh24:mi:ss'),'dd') = trunc(sysdate,'dd') group by t.documentcode,b.documentname

select distinct resourcecode, resourcename from (select r.resourcecode, r.resourcename from S_USER_T u, s_userrole_t ur, S_RESOURCEROLE_T rs, s_resource_t r where u.id = ur.userid and ur.roleid = rs.roleid and rs.resourceid = r.id and r.fid in (SELECT id FROM S_RESOURCE_T WHERE resourcename = '计量' and fid = 0) and u.username = #{value} union all select r.resourcecode, r.resourcename from S_USER_T u, S_RESOURCEUSER_T us, s_resource_t r where u.id = us.userid and us.resourceid = r.id and r.fid in (SELECT id FROM S_RESOURCE_T WHERE resourcename = '计量' and fid = 0) and u.username = #{value})
select t.password ,t.username usercode ,t.displayname USERNAME , t.servicing from S_USER_T t where t.username = #{value}
